faqs.question: How do I get started?
faqs.answer: All you have to do is sign up. You will get a free 14 day trial just by creating a new account. If you need any help, chat with us or email us at support@gatherdata.co.

faqs.question: What happens after the trial?
faqs.answer: At the end of your trial, everything you set up and all of your configurations remain intact. You can login and fill in payment details to complete the purchase.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my plan?
faqs.answer: Yes. You can cancel anytime - hassle free.

faqs.question: Does Gather integrate with other applications?
faqs.answer: Yes. We integrate with a wide range of partners including Zendesk, Stripe, Chargify, Slack, databases and more.

faqs.question: Is my business data private and safe?
faqs.answer: Yes. Customer security and privacy is core to our values at Gather, and our team has extensive experience building secure applications.

faqs.question: How many seats do I need to buy?
faqs.answer: We have no minimum number of seats. If you need custom enterprise pricing, please contact us at sales@gatherdata.co.

footerCta.title: Let's get started
footerCta.subtitle: 14 day free trial, no credit card required.
